Summary: Saw four lights form square near Wilmington, N.C.
divs: Sighting Details Wife and I went on back patio to sit. Looked upand noticed four strong lights above or in the clouds. The four formed asquare...with the farther lights being closer than the near lights. No movementobserved for about an hour. I went inside and got camera. Took anumber ofphotos of varying exposures. We noticed a beam of light coming from a couple ofthe lights aimed at the ground. Lights can be seen in some photos. No noise, nomovement. a haze was seen around the lights. They were north of our location. The partial moon could be seen to our east.
trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There were no other sightings in Wilmington on or around August 16th 2002
